verses.name: Ephesians 3:1
verses.text: For this cause I Paul, the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles,

verses.name: Ephesians 3:2
verses.text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to you-ward:

verses.name: Ephesians 3:3
verses.text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery; (as I wrote afore in few words,

verses.name: Ephesians 3:4
verses.text: Whereby, when ye read, ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ)

verses.name: Ephesians 3:5
verses.text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men, as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit;
